physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the back cover with 4; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains a letter from Lieutenant-Colonel William Rupert Hay, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf to Cornelius James Pelly, Political Agent in Bahrain. In the letter, Hay informs Pelly that Charles Belgrave, Adviser to the Government of Bahrain had recently told him that a man in Cochin had applied for a position as trade agent in Bahrain but that no such vacancy existed.
